StgTrnsUndwrEvaluation.name: StgTrnsUndwrEvaluation
StgTrnsUndwrEvaluation.description: Represents the underwriting rule evaluation result.

EvaluationDateTime.description: The date and time at which rules were applied to the target object.

EvaluationResult.description: The result of evaluation done on all rules for a transaction.

IsRuleEvaluationSuccessful.description: Indicates whether the stage transition was successful (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the underwriting rule.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

ReferenceObjectId.description: The object for which the underwriting rule was evaluated.

ReferenceObjectName.description: The name of the object for which the underwriting rule was evaluated.

ReferenceObjectStatus.description: The status of the reference object after the underwriting rule evaluation is completed.

StageTransition.description: The stage transition ID for which the underwriting rule was evaluated.
